title: Rust
description: Rust is a statically typed programming language which excels at performance and safety.

challenges.title: Intro to Rust
challenges.instructions: Write a function using [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/) which adds two numbers together. Rust is a fairly new programming language which is growing rapidly in popularity. Rust famously tries to provide the speed of a low level compiled language with the productivity of a richly featured high level language.
challenges.starterCode: // Write an add function using Rust
